definitions: Individual chemical compounds, either natural or synthetic, that possess a distinct odor and are used to create fragrances and flavors.
Substances used in the perfume, cosmetic, and food industries to impart or enhance specific scents or tastes.
examples: The perfumer carefully selected a blend of Aroma Chemicals.
Many food products contain Aroma Chemicals to improve their taste.
Research into new Aroma Chemicals is ongoing.
